data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in West Godavari. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,893,693 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 3,893,693 lost in West Godavari that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Madiga Baineedu people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Madiga Baineedu people know you.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of West Godavari.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

location.name: West Godavari
